downloadTitle: Connectivity and Firewall Port Requirements for Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013
downloadDescription: This document provides guidance on the connectivity requirements between Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 and other systems to assist readers with proper firewall configuration in customer environments.

downloadFile.name: Connectivity and firewall port requirements for Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/6/e/5/6e572dba-ead6-4705-8dfb-4cc6bc320bf5/Connectivity and firewall port requirements for Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013.pdf

detailsSection: Many data centers include firewalls between the end-users and the servers and other integrated systems that support an implementation of Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013. This document provides guidance on the connectivity requirements between Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 and other systems to assist readers with proper firewall configuration in customer environments.
detailsSection_file_name: Connectivity and firewall port requirements for Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013.pdf
installInstructionSection:
1. To start the download, click Download, and then click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
